Package GCScheduler.controller.customers

Class CustomerFormController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GCScheduler.controller.customers.CustomerFormController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddCustomerFormController, UpdateCustomerFormController
    public abstract class CustomerFormController
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent Controller for Add and Update CustomerFormControllers. Holds all connections to CustomerForm.fxml.

      • setupCombos

        public void setupCombos()

      • customerBuilder

        public Customer customerBuilder()
        Method to create a new Customer for Add and Update Forms using the input from the form fields. Builds with Name,Address,Postal,Phone, and Div ID from Form Fields.
        Returns:
        Customer with attributes from Form fields.

      • validateForm

        public boolean validateForm()
        Method to validate form fields for both Add and Update Forms.
        Returns:
        true if form is valid.
